comments.body: Perhaps, we could declare it as a const? In other words, why it should be a function?
The whitelist can be generated by a function later? E.g. read the list from a configmap or different object?
slices cannot be consts, they must be vars. I prefer keeping it like this. Dangers of shared slices that get appended to elsewhere (as this does): https://play.golang.org/p/TSWfCax7p6A
